title: Our Roles
text: 2IA engineers can take on a variety of roles, from data scientists and machine learning engineers to data engineers, AI researchers, project managers, and R&D engineers. Their flexibility and expertise make them valuable assets in the tech industry's diverse landscape.

section.title: Data Engineer
section.content: designs, develops, and manages the architecture and infrastructure for collecting, processing, and storing large volumes of data efficiently.

section.title: ML Engineer
section.content: focuses on designing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms, working to deploy them into applications.

section.title: Data Scientist
section.content: analyzes complex datasets to derive valuable insights and patterns, leveraging statistical and ML techniques to inform business decisions and solve problems.

section.title: AI Researcher
section.content: explores innovative techniques and methodologies to advance the field of artificial intelligence, contributing to the development of cutting-edge AI technologies.

section.title: R&D Engineer
section.content: involved in the intersection of research and development by working on both AI optimization and implementation.

section.title: Project Manager
section.content: oversees and coordinates the planning, execution, and delivery of projects, ensuring that goals are achieved.
